events.description:
☁️ When delusion fades away
   and dissolves,

💡 Becoming a cloud of knowledge,

🧘 Truth is realized through
   contemplation of one's own
   nature,

🌟 And everything is seen as
   the all-encompassing Atman

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

🌎 There is nothing in the three worlds,

🎯 That I should accomplish

🏆 Or that I have not achieved;

⚡ And yet I abide in action

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🌌 Consciousness is the
   cause of everything,

☀️ As day is the
   cause of many
   actions

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

✅ Perform righteous actions,

⚖️ For action is better than inaction;

🧍 Even the maintenance of your body

🏃 Is impossible through inaction

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🧠 The intellect discerns truth,

🌈 And then this very world

🏞️ Becomes an abode of bliss

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

🌠 The space of mind
   creates the division of time,

⏳ And due to which

🌍 This entire world unfolds

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

Ekadashi Putrada

🌊 Abandoning all desires
   and limitations of the mind —

🚶‍♂️ A step on the path to Brahman.

🕊️ Complete abandonment
   is called moksha,

🌟 Or the highest liberation

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

🔥 Free from passion,
   fear and anger,

🙏 Absorbed in me,
   taking refuge in me,

🧘 Purified by the fire of wisdom,

✨ Many have entered into my being

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

☁️ When delusion fades away
   and dissolves,

💡 Becoming a cloud of knowledge,

🧘 Truth is realized through
   contemplation of one's own
   nature

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

🧘 Who has renounced actions through yoga,

🔍 Who has cut off doubt through knowledge,

🌟 Who obeys only the Higher Self,

⛓️ That one cannot be bound by actions,

🏹 O Dhananjaya

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

⏳ Time devours everything,

👑 And neither the greatest people,

🌟 Nor even the gods can escape it.

🔄 It constantly creates everything

💥 And constantly destroys everything

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

⚖️ The balanced one, detached
   from the fruits of their actions

☮️ Attains Eternal Peace;

🌪️ The unbalanced, driven by desires,

🍎 Attached to the fruits,

⛓️ Remains in bondage

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

💧 Life is like a trembling
   drop of water

🌿 On the tip of a blade of grass,

⏳ Ready to unexpectedly fall

🎭 At any moment

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

💡 With a settled clear intellect,

🕉️ Abiding in Brahman
   and knowing Brahman

😊 Does not rejoice on receiving the pleasant,

😔 And does not become agitated on receiving the unpleasant

🌊 Remains calm in all circumstances

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🧠 The intellect of each possesses
   the same ability
   to create forms,

✨ As Consciousness itself,

🌍 And in each mind there exist

🔍 Its own misconceptions
   about the world

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

✨ The Higher Self is a friend of the lower "self"

🙏 Of that person who has surrendered
   to their Higher Self;

🚫 But for the unsurrendered —

⚔️ The Higher Self truly becomes hostile,

🎭 Like an enemy

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

✨ When pure Consciousness,
   the boundless unimaginable
   essence,

🌌 As if forgets itself,
   becoming an observer,

💫 Beautiful dreams arise

🔬 Even in its tiniest atom!

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

🧘 He is called a true yogi,

📚 Who, satisfied with wisdom and knowledge,

🗻 Remains as on an unshakable rock,

🔒 Whose senses are controlled,

🟤 For whom a lump of earth,
🪨 A stone,
🥇 And gold —

⚖️ Are one and the same

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

⏳ Life is fleeting,

☁️ Like swift autumn clouds,

🕯️ Like the light of a lamp
   running out of oil,

🌊 Like ripples on the surface of water

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

👑 He excels all who impartially
   looks upon:

❤️ The loving and 😐 the indifferent,
🤝 Friends and 🎭 enemies,
🏘️ Strangers and 👪 relatives,
😇 The righteous and 😈 the unrighteous

🔍 Seeing in all a single essence

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🌫️ This world is an illusion,
   though it is seen,

🌅 It has never even arisen,
   like the blue in the sky.

🕊️ O sinless one, study and
   understand this

🧘 And be free from suffering

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

👕 Just as a person,
   casting off worn-out garments,

👘 Puts on new ones,

🧘‍♂️ So He casts off worn-out bodies

✨ And enters into new ones

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

Ekadashi Shat-tila

🌙 There are no such sufferings,

🕯️ That do not disappear in the company
   of the wise,

✨ Like moonbeams

🌑 For the darkness of night

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

🧠 When his conquered thought

🆓 Free from all desires,

🎯 Is focused only on the Higher Self,

🗣️ Then it is said of him:

🌈 "He is brought into harmony"

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

⏰ Time mercilessly swallows
   everything

🌎 In this visible world

🌀 And constantly throws worlds

🌊 And their inhabitants into a sea of problems

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

🌆 Being amidst worldly bustle,

👁️ Direct attention between two breaths.

🧘 Practicing thus, in a few days
   you will be reborn

🕉 Shiva 🕉

🌪️ However much the anxious
   and inconstant mind may wander,

🏇 Restrain it constantly

🧘 And bring it under the control
   of your Higher Self

🔄 Again and again return the
   mind to its true nature

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

💫 Be it real or unreal,

💖 That which is firmly believed in the heart,

🔄 Will have corresponding
   consequences,

🧪 And thus even poison

🍯 Can become divine nectar

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

🌪️ The mind is restless by nature,

👶 And childhood is even more restless.

❓ What can be more restless,

🔄 When both are
   combined together?

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

Vasishtha Jayanti

🧘 When all thoughts
   and concepts are calmed

🏔️ And the state is like
   a motionless continuity
   within a rock

😌 But devoid of the inertia of sleep

✨ This is called ✨

🌃 Abiding in one's
   own nature 🌃

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

Vasant Panchami
(Saraswati Puja)

🔥 May the fire of knowledge burn all doubts,

🌺 And the lotus of wisdom bloom in your heart.

🕉️ Saraswati 🕉️

🌟 Supreme joy awaits
   the pacified yogi,

🧘 Whose mind has become tranquil,

🌊 Whose passionate nature is subdued,

✨ Who has become sinless

🕉️ And similar to Brahman

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🌟 When the slightest
   manifestations of ego are destroyed,

☯️ And the distinction of duality
   has calmed into stillness,

✨ When only Consciousness shines —

🧘 This is called abiding
   in one's own nature

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

👁️ He who sees me everywhere

🌍 And sees everything in me,

🤲 I never forsake him,

🔒 And he never forsakes me

💞 We are eternally united in love

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🧘 Who knows the truth of himself
   and his body,

🌈 Sees the world as a deceptive
   picture in a dream.

💭 The whole world is seen as a dream,

🔍 Including the sense of one's "I"

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

😈 And even if you are the greatest of sinners,

⛵ On the boat of wisdom

🌊 You will still cross the ocean of sin

🌅 To the shores of liberation

🧘 Wisdom purifies and elevates

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

Ekadashi Jaya

⏳ Neither sufferings nor
   pleasures last
   long for a person —

🌊 Everything comes and goes.

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

💧 I am the taste of water, O son of Kunti,

🌙 I am the radiance of the moon
☀️ and the sun,

📜 And the Sacred Word in the Vedas,

🔊 And the sound in the ether,

💪 And the valor in men

🌟 I am in everything, and everything is in Me

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🌱 I am the pure fragrance of earth

🔥 And the light of fire;

💗 I am the life of all that lives

🧗 And the austerity of ascetics

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🌤️ When gradually disappears
   from the skies of the mind

☁️ The cloud of egoism,

🌫️ The fog of delusions

🌬️ Also vanishes somewhere

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

💪 I am the strength of the strong,
   free from lust and passion.

🌱 In all beings, I am
   desire not contrary to dharma,

👑 O lord of the Bharatas

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🌪️ As a rising hurricane
   easily carries away

🌿 Dry grass blades to unknown places,

💭 So impure thoughts and desires

🕊️ Drag along the bird of reason

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

💭 To that being of which a person
   thinks at the hour of death,

🚶‍♂️ O son of Kunti, to it he goes,

☀️ As to that which is akin to his nature

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🧘 Who constantly thinks of me,
   not thinking of anything else,

⚖️ That balanced yogi, O Partha,

🌟 Easily attains me

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

😔 All unbearable sufferings
   and difficulties,

💔 And impure desires

💫 Are completely destroyed
   in the presence of a calm mind,

🌅 As darkness disappears
   in the light of the sun

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

💨 Just as the mighty wind,
   moving everywhere, rests in the Ether,

🌍 So does all that exists rest in me;

👁️ Know this

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🌟 The highest truth effortlessly

🧘 Remains with a good person,

🌊 Whose mind is in tranquility,

🤝 And who is friendly to all people

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

☯️ There is only the One,

🔄 Without beginning,

🌌 Indivisible and boundless;

⏳ With time, coming to wisdom,

💡 You will understand this with all clarity

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

🌍 I am the same for all beings;

⚖️ There is none hateful or dear to me.

🙏 But, truly, those who worship me
   with devotion,

💞 They are in me, and I am also in them

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🗯️ Only the ignorant argue

❓ Due to their doubts
   and uncertainties;

📚 After understanding the words of instruction,

🌈 The non-existence of duality
   is realized

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

🎻 Listening to stringed instruments,

🎵 Hear their central sound:

🌌 Thus omnipresence is achieved

🕉 Shiva 🕉

Ekadashi Vijaya

🍽️ One who is moderate in eating,

💤 Sleeping, working and resting,

🧘 Can alleviate all
   material sufferings,

🕉️ By practicing the system of yoga

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

🌪️ However much the anxious
   and inconstant mind may wander,

🏇 Restrain it constantly

🧘 And bring it under the control

✨ Of your Higher Self

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

Mahashivaratri

🌋 May Shiva's power fill you with determination,

🌸 And Parvati's tenderness envelop you with love.

🕉 Shiva and Parvati 🕉

🌙 And Shiva, adorned
   with the precious crescent moon,

💃 In the company of his
   playful companion,

🏔️ Reached his high position

💪 Only through
   his own efforts

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

💪 As are the efforts here,

🎯 So are the results.

🔮 What is called fate —

🔄 Is simply another name
   for one's own efforts

🕉️ Vasishtha 🕉️

Ekadashi Amalaki

🧘 Yoga destroys all suffering

🍽️ For one who has established order in eating

🎭 And entertainment

🔄 And in all their actions,

💤 As well as in the alternation
   of sleep and wakefulness

🕉️ Krishna 🕉️

Mahalakshmi Jayanti,

Holi, Ayyappa Jayanti
Ekadashi Papamochani
Brahmananda Jayanti
Spring Navaratri
Ekadashi Kamada
Ekadashi Varuthini
Akshaya Tritiya
Shankara Jayanti
Ekadashi Mohini
Ekadashi Apara
Ekadashi Nirjala
Ekadashi Yogini
Ekadashi Padma
Guru Purnima
Ekadashi Kamika
Ekadashi Shravana
Ekadashi Aja

Ganesha Chaturthi,

Sripada Srivallabha Jayanti
Ekadashi Parsva
Ekadashi Indira
Autumn Navaratri
Ekadashi Papankusha
Ramalinga Jayanti
Valmiki Jayanti
Ekadashi Rama
Dhanvantari Jayanti
Diwali (Lakshmi Puja)
Vyasa Puja
Ekadashi Prabodhini
Ekadashi Utpanna
Ekadashi Mokshada
Dattatreya Jayanti
Pambatti Jayanti
Ekadashi Saphala
Ramana Maharshi Jayanti
